author: USA TODAY, Dr. Thomas Ken Lew, Opinion contributor
title: Fake news about the coronavirus is hazardous to your health. Don't fall for it: Doctor
description: The internet is a wellspring of hoaxes, half-truths and misinformation on the coronavirus. No age group is immune, and we all need to be skeptical.
content:
Social media helps misinformation spread like wildfire so instead of contributing to 'fake news,' there are ways you can validate information online.
USA TODAY
